name: Isekai Champions
description:
This is a contest game for the RPG Maker MZ Touch the Stars game jam in June and July.

Just unzip the file and play the "Game.exe" to start the game.

It is almost 100% RTP because I haven't made one in a while and I wanna make an RTP game just because!

Barely made the deadline. I need to get some rest after this. Will update this page later. XD Right now I'm just gonna jot down a few essentials.

Lots of features didn't make it in time. It is what it is. I did my best. :p

Although the contest build won't be updated, I'll release a much more complete version later and you can play that if you're not judging.

Join our Discord for discussion and suggestions to Isekai Champions!

http://discord.gg/UtpRHPhwaD
